A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars is dead. Long Live Star Wars.\nI feel like someone read the script\, looked at the director and said \"Every word you wrote is wrong\"\, and the only response the director had was to add that to the film too. The movie left massive plot holes open\, it dragged politics into it\, and every single dramatic moment you have waited for was either played for laughs or was a complete letdown. I cannot even begin to say how much I despise this trash.
